channel.title: status updates on Drew DeVault's blog
channel.description: Recent content in status updates on Drew DeVault's blog

item.title: Status update, June 2019
item.description: Summer is in full swing here in Philadelphia. Last night I got great views of Jupiter and a nearly-full Moon, and my first Saturn observation of the year. I love astronomy on clear Friday nights, there’s always plenty of people coming through the city. And today, on a relaxing lazy Saturday, waiting for friends for dinner later, I have the privilege of sharing another status report with you. First, I want to talk about some work I’ve done with blogs lately.
